channel.title: Serverless on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Serverless on Joost Plattel

item.title: Digitale Fitheid
item.description:
For digital fitness (Digitale Fitheid in dutch) I’ve created a questionnaire where people can discover how well versed they are with technology and digital tools. The small test is developed in Svelte & run on AWS with DynamoDB / Chalice as a backend.

Curious about the test? It’s dutch only for now, but you can find it here!

item.title: EsperantoXL
item.description:
For EsperantoXL I make custom solutions to extend the possibilities of no-code applications with the help of Serverless & computing providers like AWS & Azure.

This solution allows for processing million lines of codes in a unsupported datafile, analyze & run queries on it and return it through a callback towards the no-code platform once again. Most of the implementations are based on Python.
